Text: This is one of the best movies ive seen for a long time.. Even  though its old, i personally think it beats the crap outta som of the new movies.
Absolutely wonderful movie, very touching but not barfy...
Thanks .. I am a big fan of The Cure ..... LOVE the music ... LOVE ROBERT SMITH .... Thanks a lot
verfkwast:  thx for making me laugh  :)
Thanks arensirb for uploading this touching movie.

Thanks for uploading this. I remember the first time I watched this movie. I was really wanting to watch a movie bad and my Grandma and Father ordered this for me on PPV. At the time I was only 10 and really enjoyed the movie and found it really easy to get attached to the characters.

Downloading this now. I can't wait to watch it again. Now that I'm much older I'll be able to get a better idea of what's really happening.
